name: tSILVER
description: tSILVER (TXAG) is a silver-backed token. Each tSILVER token is 1:1 backed by, and redeemable for 1 gram of 99.9% LBMA-accredited silver, held in fully insured and audited vaults. 30% of the rewards generated by tSILVER transactional fees are distributed to the holders of AurusX (AX).
